title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 358-3.5 - Substitution of new carrier under a plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 358-3.5 - Substitution of new carrier under a plan

State Regulations

If the agreement filed with the chairman under
subdivision (b) of section 358- 3.4 of this Subpart is the agreement of a
carrier and not of the employer, acceptance of the plan shall terminate
forthwith whenever the carrier's obligation to pay benefits shall terminate, unless prior thereto an acceptable new carrier, assuming fully the obligations
of the employer under the plan, has duly filed with the chairman notice thereof
and has filed also the agreements with the chairman required under section
358-3.4. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
358-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
